text: Paweł Świętek (28 October 1924 - 16 February 1989) was a Polish gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Polish male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Poland Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:People from Piekary Śląskie
title: Paweł Świętek
